overview.en: ADCC is a global distributed DIAMOND value network, aimed at combining new block CHAIN technology and the DIAMOND market, set up a CHAIN of the global DIAMOND trade blocks based financial ecosystem, rapid advance global DIAMOND CHAIN block technology to the world the speed of the completed application.
overview.zh: 钻石链（DIAMOND CHAIN） 是一个全球分布式钻石价值网络，旨在通过新型区块链技术与钻石市场结合，搭建一个基于全球钻石交易的区块链金融生态圈，快速推进全球钻石区块链技术向世界应用落地的步伐。
